text: Robert Niederkirchner (6 June 1924 – 2004) was a German footballer who played for SV Saar 05 Saarbrücken and the Saarland national team as a forward. ==References== Category:1924 births Category:2004 deaths Category:German footballers Category:Saar footballers Category:Saarland international footballers Category:Saarland B international footballers Category:SV Saar 05 Saarbrücken players Category:Association football forwards
title: Robert Niederkirchner
